default.description: Default application background color. Should be set to either html or body element.

backdrop.description: Background on overlay used with modals

default.description: Default application surface color. Use this for e.g. card backgrounds.

hover.description: Bakcground color for hover state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items hover state background.

selected.description: Bakcground color for selected state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items selected state background.

selected-hover.description: Bakcground color for selected-hover state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items selected-hover state background.

inverse.description: Background color for containers that use an inverse bg color. (eg: Tooltips)

default.description: color.background.warning.bold

brand.description: Brand color. For use on primary links.

on-color.description:
Text on interactive colors;
Text on button colors

default.description: 6px. Default border radius for UI components

small.description: 2px. Small border radius for UI components

large.description: 8px. Large border radius for UI components

focus-offset.description: Border radius for focus borders that use an offset from their parent elements that use border-radius-default (Inputs, cards, buttons etc)

default.description: Figma-only design token.
Figma-only design token.

large.description:
For more web based experiences, consider using either the Md or Lg size. 

Use either Sm or Lg for long paragraphs that cater to long form reading.

medium.description: Md sizes are best suited to either Web or Product experiences where 1.5x is too spacious

small.description:
For more web based experiences, consider using either the Md or Lg size. 

Use either Sm or Lg for long paragraphs that cater to long form reading.

default.description: Default drop shadow
Default application background color. Should be set to either html or body element.

backdrop.description: Background on overlay used with modals

default.description: Default application surface color. Use this for e.g. card backgrounds.

hover.description: Default raised surface color. Use this when you need to separate a specific layer from the surface color, e.g. table headers.

inverse.description: Background color for containers that use an inverse bg color. (eg: Tooltips)

default.description: color.background.warning.bold

brand.description: Brand color. For use on primary links.

selection-bg.description: The background color of a selected text

on-color.description:
Text on interactive colors;
Text on button colors

01.description: Micro-interactions, small expansion, short distance movements.
Micro-interactions such as button and toggle.
